        </div>
		<a class="close-reveal-modal">×</a>
	</div>	            <div id="compareModal" class="reveal-modal large" data-reveal>
    <div class="modal_overflow">
        <div class="myaccount circle"><i class="fa fa-columns circleicon"></i></div>
        <span class="c_restore"><i class="fa fa-undo"></i> Reset</span>
        <h2>Compare Results</h2>
    </div>
    <a class="close-reveal-modal">×</a>
</div>
            <script type="text/template" id="compareModalTemplate">
    <table width="100%" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" class="comparetable">
        <tbody>
            <tr>
                <td width="20%" class="c_leftcol"><h4>Overview</h4></td>
            <% for (var i = 0; i < titleInfo.length; i++) { %>
                <td class="c_prop<%= i + 1 %> c_propheader">
                    <div class="c_hidecolumn" id="hideProperty_<%= i + 1 %>" rel="<%= titleInfo[i].propertyId %>"><i class="fa fa-times"></i></div>
                    <span class="proptype"><%= translate(titleInfo[i].type) %></span>
                    <h4><%= titleInfo[i].name %></h4>
                </td>
            <% } %>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td width="20%" class="c_leftcol">Privates From</td>
            <% for (var i = 0; i < privates.length; i++) { %>
                <td class="c_prop<%= i + 1 %>"><% if (privates[i]) { %><%= currencySymbol %> <%= $.currency.round(privates[i], 2, browsingCurrency) %> <% } else { %>N/A<% } %></td>
            <% } %>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td width="20%" class="c_leftcol">Dorms From</td>
            <% for (var i = 0; i < dorms.length; i++) { %>
                <td class="c_prop<%= i + 1 %>"><% if (dorms[i]) { %><%= currencySymbol %> <%= $.currency.round(dorms[i], 2, browsingCurrency) %> <% } else { %>N/A<% } %></td>
            <% } %>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td width="20%" class="c_leftcol">Rating</td>
            <% for (var i = 0; i < ratingInfo.length; i++) { %>
                <td class="c_prop<%= i + 1 %>"><%= WRI.utils.formatRating(ratingInfo[i].rating) %> (<%= ratingInfo[i].numReviews %> Reviews) <%= translate(WRI.utils.ratingWord(ratingInfo[i].rating)) %></td>
            <% } %>
            </tr>
            <tr class="distanceFromMe" style="display:none;">
                <td width="20%" class="c_leftcol">Distance from me</td>
            <% for (var i = 0; i < distancesFromCityCentre.length; i++) { %>
                <td class="c_prop<%= i + 1 %>" id="distanceFromMe_<%= titleInfo[i].propertyId %>"></td>
            <% } %>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td width="20%" class="c_leftcol">Distance from city centre</td>
                <% for (var i = 0; i < distancesFromCityCentre.length; i++) { %>
                    <td class="c_prop<%= i + 1 %>"><%= distancesFromCityCentre[i] %>km</td>
                <% } %>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td width="20%" class="c_leftcol"><h4>Facilities</h4></td>
                <% for (var i = 0; i < dorms.length; i++) { %><td class="c_prop<%= i + 1 %>"> </td><% } %>
            </tr>
        <% for (var facilityCode in allFacilities) { %>
            <tr class="<% if ($.inArray(allFacilities[facilityCode].id, initialFacilities) == -1) { %>not-initial-facility<% } else { %>initial-facility<% } %>">
                <td width="20%" class="c_leftcol"><%= allFacilities[facilityCode].title %></td>
            <% for (var i = 0; i < facilities[facilityCode].length; i++) { %>
                <td class="c_prop<%= i + 1 %>"><i class="fa <% if (facilities[facilityCode][i]) { %>fa-check <% } else { %>fa-times <% } %>rounded"></i></td>
            <% } %>
            </tr>
        <% } %>
            <tr>
                <td width="20%" class="c_leftcol"><a href="" id="c_showFacilities">Show more</a></td>
                <% for (var i = 0; i < dorms.length; i++) { %><td class="c_prop<%= i + 1 %>"> </td><% } %>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td width="20%" class="c_leftcol"><h4>Location</h4></td>
                <td class="c_map" colspan="<%= dorms.length %>">
                    <div id="compareMap" class="mapView"></div>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </tbody>
    </table>
</script>
            <div id="mapOverlay" class="reveal-modal xlarge" data-reveal>
    <a href="" class="close-reveal-modal">close <i class="fa fa-times"></i></a>
    <div id="modalMap"></div>
</div>

                            <script type="text/template" id="fabPropertyTemplate">
    <div class="fabresult <% if(isFeatured || property.isAffiliateMeta) { %>featured<% } %> rounded clearfix hwta-property "
         url="<%= property.url %>"
         id="searchResults_<%= property.id %>"
    <% if (typeof propertyIndex != 'undefined') { %> rel="<%= propertyIndex %>"<% } %>
        data-name="<%= property.name %>"
        data-id="<%= property.id %>">
    <%
        var target = (displayMode === 'mapView') ? '_blank' : '_self';
        var rel = (displayMode === 'mapView') ? 'noreferrer noopener' : '';
    %>


    <div class="fabresult-image small-12 medium-5 large-4 columns rounded" data-images="
        <% for (var i = 0; i < property.images.length; i++) { %>
             <%= property.images[i] %><% if (i < property.images.length -1) { %>,<% } %>
        <% } %>">

        <div class="galleryholder">
            <div class="imageholder rounded" data-src="//icd.hwstatic.com/static/images/3.49.3.0/static/images/brandloader.gif"
            <% if (property.images) { %>data-lazy-interchange="
            [<%= getResizedImagePath(property.mainImage, 20) %>, (small)],
            [<%= getResizedImagePath(property.mainImage, 30) %>, (medium)]" <% } %>
            >
            <% if (property.images.length > 1 && displayMode != 'mapView') { %>
            <a class="defaultArrow fa fa-2x fa-chevron-circle-left" href="#"></a>
            <a class="defaultArrow fa fa-2x fa-chevron-circle-right" href="#"></a>
            <% } %>
        </div>
    </div>
    <% if (typeof property.isHRP != 'undefined' && property.isHRP) { %>
        <span class="hw-recommends rounded has-tip" data-tooltip aria-haspopup="true" title="We love this hostel! It gets our thumbs up for consistently high customer ratings and excellent quality scores.">
            <i class="fa fa-thumbs-up fa-flip-horizontal rounded"></i>
        </span>
    <% } %>

    <% if (typeof property.minNightsWarning != 'undefined' && property.minNightsWarning) { %>
    <div class="propmessage_picture">
        <span class="dateswarning panel callout hwta-property-stay-rule-violation"><i class="fa fa-info-circle"></i> <%= property.minNightsWarning %></span>
    </div>
    <% } %>

    <% if (property.images.length > 1) { %>
        <ul class="no-bullet inline-list hwta-thumb-list">
            <% for (var i = 1; i < 5; i++) { %>
                <li>
                    <a class="thumb-link" data-orbit-link="<%= 'image-' + property.id + '-' + i %>">
                        <img data-src="<%= getResizedImagePath(property.images[i], 20) %>"/>
                    </a>
                </li>
            <% } %>
            <% if (property.images.length > 5) { %>
                <li class="remainder rounded">
                    <a class="launch-carousel">+<%= property.images.length - 5 %></a>
                </li>
            <% } %>
        </ul>
    <% } %>

    </div>

    <div class="resultheader rounded clearfix small-12 medium-7 large-8 columns clearfix">

        <div class="<% if (isFeatured) { %>featureheading<% } else { %>proptype<% } %> featureline">

                <%= translate('UC__FEATUREDPROPERTY') %>
            <% } else if (property.isAffiliateMeta) { %>
                <%= translate('UC__YOURPROPERTY') %>
            <% } else { %>
                <%= translate(property.propertyType) %>
            <% } %>
        </div>

        <h2>
            <a href="<%= property.url %><%= position %>" target="<%= target %>" rel="<%= rel %>" class="hwta-property-link">
                <%= property.name %>
            </a>
        </h2>
        <div class="mobileproperty">
            <% if (isFeatured) { %>
                <%= translate('UC__FEATUREDPROPERTY') %>
            <% } else if (property.isAffiliateMeta) { %>
                <%= translate('UC__YOURPROPERTY') %>
            <% } else { %>
                <%= translate(property.propertyType) %>
            <% } %>
        </div>
        <div class="addressline">
            <i class="fa fa-location-arrow"></i> <%= translate('FROMCITYCENTER', {distance: property.distance}) %> <a href="" class="showOnMap">- Show on Map</a>
        </div>

        <% if (!property.ratingBarsRemoved && !property.noRating) { %>

        <div class="fabresult-details-rating<% if (property.averageRating == 0) { %> norating<% } else if (WRI.utils.formatRating(property.averageRating) < 6) { %> lowrating<% }%>">
            <div class="hwta-rating-container<% if (property.averageRating == 0) { %> norating<% } else if (WRI.utils.formatRating(property.averageRating) < 6) { %> lowrating<% }%>">
                <div class="hwta-rating-summary">
                    <% if (property.numReviews > 0) { %>
                        <a href="<%= property.reviewsUrl %>" class="hwta-rating-score" target="<%= target %>" rel="<%= rel %>">
                            <%= WRI.utils.formatRating(property.averageRating) %>
                        </a>
                    <% } else { %>
                        <div class="hwta-rating-score">
                            <%= WRI.utils.formatRating(property.averageRating) %>
                        </div>
                    <% } %>

                    <div class="hwta-rating-info">
                        <span class="hwta-rating-text-score">
                            <%= translate(WRI.utils.ratingWord(property.averageRating)) %>
                        </span>
                        <% if (property.numReviews > 0) { %>
                            <a href="<%= property.reviewsUrl %>" class="hwta-rating-counter" target="<%= target %>" rel="<%= rel %>">
                                <i class="fa fa-comment-o"></i>
                                <%= property.numReviews %>
                            </a>
                        <% } else { %>
                            <div class="hwta-rating-counter">
                                <i class="fa fa-comment-o"></i>
                                <%= property.numReviews %>

                                    <i class="fa fa-map-marker fa-flip-horizontal rounded"></i>
                                </span>
                                <span class="hwta-rating-factors-label">
                                    <%= humanizeRating(property.ratings.propertyReview.Location, 'LOCATION') %>
                                </span>
                            </li>
                        <% } %>

                        <% if (property.ratings.propertyReview.Staff >= property.ratings.minPositiveReviewScore) { %>
                            <li>
                                <span class="hwta-rating-factors-icon hwta-rating-factors-icon-green">
                                    <i class="fa fa-user fa-flip-horizontal rounded"></i>
                                </span>
                                <span class="hwta-rating-factors-label">
                                    <%= humanizeRating(property.ratings.propertyReview.Staff, 'STAFF') %>
                                </span>
                            </li>
                        <% } %>

                        <% if (property.ratings.propertyReview.Clean >= property.ratings.minPositiveReviewScore) { %>
                            <li>
                                <span class="hwta-rating-factors-icon hwta-rating-factors-icon-blue">
                                    <i class="fa fa-magic fa-rotate-180 rounded"></i>
                                </span>
                                <span class="hwta-rating-factors-label">
                                    <%= humanizeRating(property.ratings.propertyReview.Clean, 'CLEANLINESS') %>
                                </span>
                            </li>
                        <% } %>
                    </ul>
                <% } %>
            </div>
            <% if (property.hasFreeWifi || property.hasFreeBreakfast) { %>
            <div class="mobilefacilities">
                <% if (property.hasFreeWifi) { %>
                    <div class="facility icon_freewifi"><i class="fa fa-wifi"></i></div>
                <% } %>
                <% if (property.hasFreeBreakfast) { %>
                    <div class="facility icon_freebrekkie"><i class="fa fa-coffee"></i></div>
                <% } %>
            </div>
            <% } %>
        </div>


        <% } else if (!property.ratingBarsRemoved && property.noRating) { %>

        <div class="fabresult-details-rating norating">
            <div class="hwta-rating-container norating">
                <div class="hwta-rating-summary">
                    <a href="<%= property.reviewsUrl %>" class="hwta-rating-score" target="<%= target %>" rel="<%= rel %>">
                        <%= WRI.utils.formatRating(property.averageRating) %>
                    </a>
                    <div class="hwta-rating-info">
                        <% if (property.isNew) { %>
                            <span class="hwta-rating-text-score">
                                New
                            </span>
                        <% } else { %>
                            <% if (property.numReviews > 0) { %>
                                <a class="hwta-rating-text-score" href="<%= property.reviewsUrl %>" target="<%= target %>" rel="<%= rel %>">
                                    No Rating
                                </a>
                            <% } else { %>
                                <span class="hwta-rating-text-score">
                                    No Rating
                                </span>
                            <% } %>
                        <% } %>

                        <% if (!property.isNew) { %>
                            <% if (property.numReviews > 0) { %>
                                <a href="<%= property.reviewsUrl %>" class="hwta-rating-counter" target="<%= target %>" rel="<%= rel %>">
                                    <i class="fa fa-comment-o"></i> <%= property.numReviews %>
                                </a>
                            <% } else { %>
                                <span class="hwta-rating-counter">
                                    <i class="fa fa-comment-o"></i> <%= property.numReviews %>
                                </span>
                            <% } %>
                        <% } %>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <% if (typeof property.ratings.propertyReview !== 'undefined') { %>
                    <ul class="hwta-rating-factors clearfix">
                        <% if (property.ratings.propertyReview.Location >= property.ratings.minPositiveReviewScore) { %>
                        <li>
                            <span class="hwta-rating-factors-icon hwta-rating-factors-icon-red">
                                <i class="fa fa-map-marker fa-flip-horizontal rounded"></i>
                            </span>
                            <span class="hwta-rating-factors-label">
                                <%= humanizeRating(property.ratings.propertyReview.Location, 'LOCATION') %>
                            </span>
                        </li>
                        <% } %>

                        <% if (property.ratings.propertyReview.Staff >= property.ratings.minPositiveReviewScore) { %>
                        <li>
                            <span class="hwta-rating-factors-icon hwta-rating-factors-icon-green">
                                <i class="fa fa-user fa-flip-horizontal rounded"></i>
                            </span>
                            <span class="hwta-rating-factors-label">
                                <%= humanizeRating(property.ratings.propertyReview.Staff, 'STAFF') %>
                            </span>
                        </li>
                        <% } %>

                        <% if (property.ratings.propertyReview.Clean >= property.ratings.minPositiveReviewScore) { %>
                        <li>
                            <span class="hwta-rating-factors-icon hwta-rating-factors-icon-blue">
                                <i class="fa fa-magic fa-rotate-180 rounded"></i>
                            </span>
                            <span class="hwta-rating-factors-label">
                                <%= humanizeRating(property.ratings.propertyReview.Clean, 'CLEANLINESS') %>
                            </span>
                        </li>
                        <% } %>
                    </ul>
                <% } %>
            </div>
        </div>
        <%  } %>

        <% if (property.hasFreeWifi) { %>
        <div class="icon_freewifi"><i class="fa fa-wifi"></i> Free WiFi</div>
        <% } %>
        <% if (property.hasFreeBreakfast) { %>
        <div class="icon_freebrekkie"><i class="fa fa-coffee"></i> Free Breakfast</div>
        <% } %>

        <% if (!property.hasFreeWifi && !property.hasFreeBreakfast){ %>
        <div class="facilities_placeholder"></div>
        <% } %>

                    <span class="price">
                        <a class="dormroom" href="<%= property.url %><%= position %>" class="hwta-property-link" target="<%= target %>" rel="<%= rel %>">
                            <%= currencySymbol %><%= $.currency.round(property.lowestAverageDormPricePerNight, 2, browsingCurrency) %>
                        </a>
                    </span>
                    <a href="<%= property.url %><%= position %>" class="hwta-property-link" target="<%= target %>" rel="<%= rel %>"><% if (!isGroupBooking) { %>Dorms From<% } else { %>Dorm Rooms From<% } %></a>
                </li>
                <% } else { %>
                <% } %>
                <% } %>

                <% if (showPrivatePrice) { %>
                <% property.lowestAveragePrivatePricePerNight = parseFloat(property.lowestAveragePrivatePricePerNight) %>
                <% if (!isNaN(property.lowestAveragePrivatePricePerNight) && property.lowestAveragePrivatePricePerNight > 0) { %>
                <li class="singleprice clearfix">
                        <span class="price">
                            <a class="privateroom hwta-property-link" href="<%= property.url %><%= position %>" target="<%= target %>" rel="<%= rel %>">
                                <%= currencySymbol %><%= $.currency.round(property.lowestAveragePrivatePricePerNight, 2, browsingCurrency) %>
                            </a>
                        </span>
                    <a href="<%= property.url %><%= position %>" class="hwta-property-link" target="<%= target %>" rel="<%= rel %>"><% if (!isGroupBooking) { %>Privates From<% } else { %>Private Rooms From<% } %></a>
                </li>
                <% } else { %>
                <% } %>
                <% } %>

                <% if (showMinPrice) { %>
                <li class="dormprice clearfix">
                    <span class="price">
                        <a class="dormroom hwta-property-link" href="<%= property.url %><%= position %>" target="<%= target %>" rel="<%= rel %>">
                            <%= currencySymbol %><%= $.currency.round(property.minPriceInBrowsingCurrency, 2, browsingCurrency) %>
                        </a>
                    </span>
                    <a href="<%= property.url %><%= position %>" class="hwta-property-link" target="<%= target %>" rel="<%= rel %>">Prices from</a>
                </li>
                <% } %>

                <% } %>
                <% if (typeof property.minNightsWarning != 'undefined' && property.minNightsWarning) { %>
                <li class="propmessage_pricing">
                    <div class="propertymessages">
                        <span class="dateswarning panel callout hwta-property-stay-rule-violation"><i class="fa fa-info-circle"></i> <%= property.minNightsWarning %></span>
                    </div>
                </li>
                <% } %>
            </ul>

        </div>

        <div class="show-for-medium-up compare">
            <input type="checkbox" id="comparecheckbox<%= property.id %>" class="comparecheckbox"<% if (isComparisonProperty) { %> checked="checked" <% } %>/>
            <label class="show-compare-modal">Compare</label>
        </div>

    </div>


    <a href="<%= property.url %><%= position %>" class="moreinfo button tiny radius hwta-property-link" target="<%= target %>" rel="<%= rel %>">View</a>

    <% if (typeof property.minNightsWarning != 'undefined' && property.minNightsWarning) { %>
    <div class="propmessage_bottom">
        <span class="dateswarning panel callout hwta-property-stay-rule-violation"><i class="fa fa-info-circle"></i> <%= property.minNightsWarning %></span>
    </div>
    <% } %>

    </div>


</script>
